user_query: I want to determine the geocodes for different venues and gather more information about each location.

TaskList.description: Query the geocode information for the Community Center.
Query the geocode information for the Park.
Query the geocode information for the Library.
Perform geolookup for the Community Center to gather additional location information based on the geocode from Subtask 1.
Perform geolookup for the Park to gather additional location information based on the geocode from Subtask 2.
Perform geolookup for the Library to gather additional location information based on the geocode from Subtask 3.
